00035 /*
00036  * Helper class for writing hgr scene files. 
00037  * See maxexport and NS(Scene,Scene) for usage examples
00038  * and hgr-fileformat.txt for documentation.
00039  * @ingroup hgr
00040  */
00041 class SceneOutputStream :
00042     public NS(io,DataOutputStream)
00043 {
00044 public:
00046     static const int VERSION;
00047 
00055     explicit SceneOutputStream( NS(io,OutputStream)* out, int dataflags, NS(gr,Context)::PlatformType platformid, int exporterversion );
00056 
00058     ~SceneOutputStream();
00059 
00065     void    writeFloat3( const NS(math,float3)& obj );
00066 
00072     void    writeFloat4( const NS(math,float4)& obj );
00073 
00079     void    writeQuaternion( const NS(math,quaternion)& obj );
00080 
00086     void    writeFloat3x4( const NS(math,float3x4)& obj );
00087 
00093     void    writeVertexFormat( const NS(gr,VertexFormat)& vf );
00094 
00101     void    writePrimitive( NS(gr,Primitive)* prim, const NS(lang,Array)<NS(gr,Shader)*>& globshaderlist );
00102 
00108     void    writeNode( Node* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00109 
00116     void    writeMesh( Mesh* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<NS(gr,Primitive)*>& globprimitivelist,
00117                 const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00118 
00124     void    writeCamera( Camera* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00125 
00131     void    writeLight( Light* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00132 
00138     void    writeDummy( Dummy* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00139 
00145     void    writeLines( Lines* obj, const NS(lang,Array)<Node*>& globnodelist );
00146 
00151     void    writeTransformAnimation( TransformAnimation* obj );
00152

00158 
00163     void    writeFloat3Anim( TransformAnimation::Float3Anim* obj );
00164 
00168     void    writeFloat4Array16( const NS(math,float4)* a, int count );
00169 
00173     void    writeFloat3Array16( const NS(math,float3)* a, int count );
00174 
00179     void    writeUserPropertySet( UserPropertySet* obj );
00180
